about_the_game:
The official version of the domestic single-player game "Guilty: Ashlar" is about to be released on Steam!
Steam Store Interface: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2553800/_/
About the game:
1. This is a single-player role-playing game of adventure puzzle genre, players will adventure step by step in the dark fantasy world and uncover the truth of this world.
2. The promotion of the game mainly relies on "grid exploration + event interaction + concise combat performance" as the core gameplay, and creates an overall game atmosphere with a style similar to "dark dungeon";
3. The event interaction mainly uses text prompts + selection feedback as the main interaction of the game, so it only needs the mouse to operate easily;
4. In order to facilitate adventure and exploration, the game adopts a vertical screen for display (small map and large map are displayed up and down), only mouse operation is required to play, the content includes: no less than 30 hours (if you are not a skilled hand, it may reach 40+50 hours) of main story content and 2 additional modes (quasi-random nature);
Levels: Nearly 600 large and small maps are available to explore;
Enemies: There are more than 1,000 types of different enemies;
If you like this type of game, you might as well add Guilt: Ashlar to your wishlist!!
QQ official group: 342110943
Bilibili: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1eu411w7RM/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click&vd_source=933d7eb3ed809c521bcdc0abae4f8612
